name: Monsieur Fantasy
description:
A STRANGE MAN JUST APPEAR IN FRONT OF ME??

Strange man appearing in front of you, will you accept his invitation?

A short game with a self proclaimed French man looking a people to talk with him and talking about dating stuff. Will you ended up with him then having a date and go to romantic city of paris or reject his invitation?

Made for O2A2 2022 game jam

Features:
  • A “French” man
  • Oui oui baguette man have a random accessories (1 sprite with multiple accessories)
  • Customizable name (Juliette by default)
  • 3 endings
  • 1k words
Credits:

Art, Story, Programming by Lattesan

Background by Ansimuz

Music by Dova Syndrome
